H0.text: Digestive is a system that functions to protect and support vital organs.

H1.text: The skeletal system functions to protect and support vital organs.

H2.text: The nervous system functions to protect and support vital organs.

H3.text: The excretory system functions to protect and support vital organs.

A4.text: The skeleton serves many functions, working as an integument to provide a barrier and support the body, providing appendages for movement and defense, and assisting in sensory perception.

A5.text: It serves as a scaffold which supports organs, anchors muscles, and protects organs such as the brain, lungs, heart and spinal cord.
